amendment.description: To append the Fourth Amendment Is Not For Sale Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1829, under the order of 4/19/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 61. Record Vote Number: 144.

action.text: Amendment SA 1829 proposed by Senator Paul.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1829 proposed by Senator Paul.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1829, under the order of 4/19/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 61. Record Vote Number: 144.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1829, under the order of 4/19/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 61. Record Vote Number: 144.
